demos.prompt: Find which of these words does not belong: Stir, Pressure, Jump
What's the best way to get rid of ants in the house.
Shouldn't a Roth IRA accumulate more than 1 cent of interest per month?
Come up with a funny pun involving the word 'cat'.
No one will pay any attention to me, I'm sure it will be fine.
Saving tax for long term stock investment capital gain by quiting my current job?
Compare and contrast the benefits of using Apache Cassandra and MongoDB.

signature.instructions: Classify if a text is specific for a domain or not.

fields.description: The target domain to classify the prompt against.
1, if the input text belong to domain, 0 otherwise.
